name: Data Verification Tool
body:
### Administrator Manual

Almost all topics in this manual require you to be logged on as an administrative user.

## Primary topics
1. Adding and maintaining Councils and their users.
2. Administrator and normal users.
3. Manually uploading Council data files.
4. Automated uploading of Council data files.
5. Understanding the results of a data file upload.

## Adding and maintaining Councils and their users

# Creating a new Council
1. Create a new Council
2. Create a user for the Council.
3. Upload data files (see section 'Manually upload Council data files').

# Editing and Updating users

To edit a user:
1. Click on Admin | Users.
2. Edit the name, email, password, or permissions.
3. Save the user.

To edit a Council definition:
1. Click on Admin | All Councils to return to the homepage.
2. Start to type the name of the Council in the textbox named 'Filter by Council name ...'
3. When you see the name of the Council you are interested in, click on it.

![How to select a council](http://nswplanning.github.io/data-verification-tool/images/select_a_council.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
